title: Too much champ shards in hextech boxes
body:
this is very frustrating  tbh 
this is the 6th hextech box i open the here is the result 
5 champ shards 
1 skin shard 
i have to wait like 1 week again to craft another key 


we get champ shards from lvling 
so what is the point of the possibility of getting champ shards from boxes 
its really  annoying
